settings.text: Everything you need to know about Walter Cookware and their superior performance.

settings.custom_liquid:
Frequently Asked Questions

Why choose titanium over traditional kitchen materials?

Titanium outperforms conventional materials in almost every way:

  • No PFAS, no Teflon, no microplastics.
  • A cleaner and safer surface for cooking.
  • Resistant to corrosion and scratches.
  • 100% recyclable.
Is titanium safe for contact with food?

Yes. Titanium is non-reactive, does not leach into food, and is used in medicine due to its purity. No coatings, no toxins.

How do Walter's products compare to non-stick coatings?

Titanium is low-maintenance. Wash with warm water, avoid thermal shocks. Natural patina improves performance over time.

Are titanium kitchen products dishwasher safe?

Yes. All our pure titanium products are dishwasher safe and highly resistant to heat and cleaning agents.

How long do Walter's titanium products last?

Unlike coated pans, titanium does not wear out. With proper maintenance, they last for decades.

Are Walter's products environmentally friendly?

Yes. Titanium is fully recyclable, and our focus on quality over quantity reduces waste.

Shipping & Delivery

Where do you ship to?

We provide free shipping to the United States, Canada, Australia, and New Zealand.

How long does it take to process an order?

All orders are processed within 1 business day.

When will I receive my order?

On average, it takes 5-8 days for you to receive your order.

Will I receive tracking information?

Yes, you will receive a confirmation email with tracking information once processed.

What if my order is delayed or lost?

Please contact us at support@waltercookware.com.

How can I contact you?

Reach our support team at support@waltercookware.com

Guarantees

What is our return policy?

We offer a 100-day return period. Items must be unused and in original packaging.

Why is titanium superior?

Non-toxic, light, strong, and develops natural seasoning. Heat resistant up to 1000Â°F.

How do I initiate a return?

Contact customer service at support@waltercookware.com.

What does our lifetime warranty cover?

It covers metal-related defects like corrosion or deformation caused by manufacturing faults.

What if my product arrives damaged?

Contact us immediately for a replacement or refund.
